00033 class SMIFile : public ifstream
00034 {
00035         friend class SMIFileCollection;
00036         
00037         public:
00043                 SMIFile(string filename,Time frameDuration) : filename(filename),frameDuration(frameDuration),nFrames(-1),t(-1),gap(-1),frameN(-1) {};
00047                 SMIFile() : filename(""),frameDuration(-1),nFrames(-1),t(-1),gap(-1),frameN(-1) {};
00051                 virtual ~SMIFile() {};
00057                 virtual void set(string filename,Time frameDuration) { this->filename = filename; this->frameDuration = frameDuration; };
00062                 virtual void open() throw(NLXError);
00066                 virtual void init();
00071                 virtual bool readFrame();
00076                 virtual long getNFrames() { return nFrames; };
00081                 virtual Time getGap() { return gap; };
00086                 virtual Time getTimestamp() { return t; };
00087 
00088         private:
00089 
00090                 string          filename;
00091                 Time                    frameDuration;
00092                 long                    nFrames;
00093                 Time                    t;
00094                 Time                    gap;
00095                 int                     frameN;
00096 };
